Title: Requires a custodial parent who lives with a sex offender to provide that information to a non-custodial parent
Summary: Requires a custodial parent who lives with a sex offender to provide that information to a non-custodial parent.
LawCode: Add ยง240-e, Dom Rel L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the domestic relations law, in relation to requiring a custodial parent who lives with a sex offender to provide that information to a non-custodial parent
